bibl.title: Payments to bucellarii in Seventh-Century Oxyrhynchus.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: An extensive receipt for payments to bucellarii (32 cavalrymen and 26 infantrymen), issued by the Apionic banker Makarios. Oxyrhynchus, 28 September-27 October 612. The text offers a wealth of information on the composition and organisation of the bands of bucellarii and on the presence of foreign soldiers in Egypt at that time. - Avec résumé en anglais.
